summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3216, for the improvement of 36th Avenue South from Hanford Street to Mt. Baker Boulevard, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39733 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
